text: geudaeneun geudeul-ui hyeonse salm-e daehan tam-yoggwa bulsinjadeul-ui tam-yog-eul balgyeonhalila geudeul gagjaneun cheonnyeon-eul jangsuhagoja hana geu jangsuneun geudeul eul jaeang-eulobuteo guwonhaji moshaniineun hananimkkeseo geudeul-i haenghaneun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gyesigi ttaemun ila
